players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "That's a lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso trying to frame me."
Bob: "I need to hear more from both of you. Charlie, why did you investigate Alice? Alice, why did you investigate Charlie?"
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of a more suspicious target? Alice, same question - why investigate Charlie first night?"
You: "I investigated Charlie because he seemed the most likely to be mafia. Charlie is lying about me to save himself."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice, she is mafia. Alice claiming detective is desperate. Bob, trust me - vote Alice to win."
